tweet: Mana is an important part of the #IOTA 2.0 protocol. Now we share the theoretical side of #mana & offer some insight into its implementation in our new blog post Explaining Mana in IOTA!  https://t.co/N6Zxs4HNSN
Welcome Devin Turner to the #IOTA Foundation!  https://t.co/WycQaXpe8A #WelcometoIOTA

We are looking for talented Technical Writers. Your job will be essential in making #IOTA succeed by bringing our technology closer to our community, end users, and partners.  https://t.co/Y6KFg4JzKw #softwarejobs #remote #remotejobs #DLT

#IOTA is not only feeless! 🤔 You will even earn money, if you send IOTA through nodes that need Mana to issue a lot of transactions...  So the IOTA Foundation is literally turning #Blockchain on it's head. Because "Miners"(nodes) have to pay the users 😁   https://t.co/S9yZKgOPR9

"For all intents and purposes for honest users, there will essentially be no #ProofofWork. The protocol will implement something called adaptive proof of work as spam prevention."  #IOTA will be #fast, #secure and #feeless 💪

2025: You are watching TV with your wife, #IOTA on the news. She starts screaming "WTF $100 for 1? Dont we hold 40.000 of these?"  You "No... I sold at $0.24"  Kids whispering in the background "Fucking looser"
